title: Using Mock data
description:
It's an example of using mock files for Twig data.

Data object for this section you can find in the src/views/mocks/example.json.

all mock variables start from _ so if you need variable _blog create a new json file blog.json. If you add a new folder in the mock directory (mock/news/article.json) this data will be available in templates via _news.article
